Package Game2048.Moving

Class passDestination

java.lang.Object
Game2048.MenuController
Game2048.Moving.GenerateNumRandom
Game2048.Moving.passDestination
Direct Known Subclasses:
Move
public class passDestination extends GenerateNumRandom
This class is used to contain the method of moving coordinate, when the left, right, up and down key is pressed by user in the keyboard, all cells will be moved to the sides which user pressed, and check whether the cell is empty or not, if the cell is not empty then record the position of the cell.

      public int passLeft(int i, int j)
      When user press left key, check whether the cells are empty or not, when cells moving left.
      Parameters:
      i - is used to describe the row of the cell in.
      j - is used to describe the column of the cell in.
      Returns:
      the position which cell is not empty.
